dct_title_s: A new and correct map of North America : in which the places of the principal engagements during the present war are accurately inserted
dct_description_sm: Relief shown pictorially. "Published as the Act directs." Prime meridian: London. From: Political magazine, v. 1, April 1780.
dct_publisher_sm: London : ... I. Bew, Pater Noster Row, April 26th 1780.
